Message:
When I came to,
I was drifting through darkness...

...unable to put an end to these
evil thoughts that made my heart
overflow...with hatred.

Then...a gentle light
shone through the darkness.

I felt something emanating from it—
a love that put my heart at ease...
like Granny’s smile once did.
I reached towards the light,

and a man holding a staff
took my hand.
His hand was gentle...

One that heals people,
just like Granny...

The moment I touched him,
my memories started coming
back to me.

I remembered what
Granny said that day,

when she gently scolded
me for being upset.

“Use the flowers to connect
the hearts of people...

like a tree connecting
the sky with the soil...

so that together, we can
[cultivate these bonds], and grow...”
Those were her words.
Granny...

Right now, I’m traveling
the world to heal everyone
whose hearts are suffering
with grief and despair.

He’s here, too, of course...
So, don’t worry about me.
This world’s full of tears,

but I’ll turn it into one
full of flowers...

There’s so much love
in the flowers you gave me...

and I won’t rest until I’ve
covered the entire world
with them.
